price: 111. Ginö foocitte inkih Rammitteh, nuwwiih inkinnah rabewaah isi ginö caagiidal sooloh yan Rabbih, nummah kay ginok addunyal agleyta kaat hee num kasaariteh Qhiyaamah ayro.
arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waʿanati al-wujūhu lil'ḥayyi al-qayūmi waqad khāba man ḥamala ẓul'man
